By Lin Wu on Sunday, September 11, 2005 - 05:00 am:

Is there something I should look for when battling Donogle? Or a strong attack my Garu can use on him?

By Shadowscythe1234 on Sunday, October 9, 2005 - 11:50 am:

I used beam but fire upper or stomp also do significant damage.

By Apocalypse on Saturday, October 15, 2005 - 11:24 am:

I wold suggest fire kick as it is accurate and does high damage. (B power and A accuracy)

By Lin Wu on Saturday, October 22, 2005 - 04:13 am:

Hey, your right! I fire stomped him about 3x then *pooted* and he died! Thanks! :)
